name: poc-gherkin-testcafe
description: A proof of concept testing the coupling between Gherkin-TestCaf√© and Allure.

scripts.test:command:allure: npx gherkin-testcafe firefox tests/steps/*.ts tests/steps/*.js tests/features/*.feature --reporter allure
scripts.test:command:cucumber: npx gherkin-testcafe firefox tests/steps/*.ts tests/steps/*.js tests/features/*.feature --reporter cucumber-json:reports/report.json --reporter-app-name='poc-gherkin-testcafe' --reporter-app-version='0.0.1'
scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure/allure-results --clean -o allure/allure-report && allure open allure/allure-report

author: Ronald van den Broek
